Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc26
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.ui.gui.sceneControllers

Class SecretMissionChoiceController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.ui.gui.sceneControllers.SceneController
it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.ui.gui.sceneControllers.SecretMissionChoiceController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class SecretMissionChoiceController extends SceneController implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This controller manages the secret mission selection scene. It allows the user to select the secret mission and chat with other players.
